New-York Historical Society
James Smith and Job Wright releases to Moses Coddington
Smith, James, active 1827 (attorney)
AHMC - Coddington, Moses
2 item(s) in 1 folder
1827 Two releases to Moses Coddington in connection with a real estate transaction for property on Duane Street in Manhattan. Both releases relate to claims against John Wilson and Clarinda Purdy of New York. One release by attorney James Smith and the other by milkman Job Wright.
To request this material for research, and for fuller information about it, please follow this link to the record in N-YHS's catalog, Bobcat: James Smith and Job Wright releases to Moses Coddington
